display_long_description:
The world remains in eternal darkness and only you can bring the dawn. Enlist in the ranks of **The Light Brigade**, humanity’s last line of defense. Journey through procedurally-generated battlegrounds as many times as it takes to free the souls of the fallen in this challenging roguelike shooter.\
[media] \
**✧PHYSICS-BASED GUNPLAY**\
Physics-based gunplay creates tense battles against increasingly difficult enemies. Survival depends on your steady hands and mastery over realistic rifles, SMGs, pistols, machine guns, and more.\
[media]\
**✧HARDCORE ROGUELIKE**\
Roguelike gameplay features procedurally-generated battlegrounds, an array of gun attachments (such as tactical scopes, silencers and charms), magic spells, buffs, and permadeath.

[media]
**✧POWERFUL LIGHT MAGIC**\
Light magic pairs beautifully with gunplay, offering new and tactical ways to defeat a wide range of increasingly difficult enemies.\
[media]\
**✧MAGICAL TAROT CARDS**\
Loot tarot cards from enemies and treasure chests during runs to stack a variety of buffs/debuffs for devastating effects.\
[media] \
**✧ASCEND THE RANKS**\
Ascend the ranks of The Light Brigade to improve your weapons, spells, character traits, gear, and abilities. Unlock new character classes and playstyles, making each journey unique.\
[media]\
**✧UNCOVER THE MYSTERIES**\
Uncover what led to the world’s downfall as you fight to save it from the darkness.

[media]
